Class Scanner 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----Scanner
public class Scanner
extends Object
Scanner. Reads in a lang2 program file, does some witchy stuff to it, and spits out whether the file is okay or not. Lexical analysis.

Author:
Ethan Georgi

Scanner()
Constructor.

distributeProgName(String)
Get the program name to all the places it needs to be.
getProgram()
Open the program file
program()
seeProgram()
Dump the program file to the screen.
seeTokens()
Dump the token file to the screen.
